Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Oh, this?
<PAGE>
I'm working on a flower arrangement. I want to
use local flowers to represent the feel of the
town.
<PAGE>
This is the practice bouquet.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can watch, if you're interested.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great! Have a seat over there.
Wow! It's like you're a pro!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, it's not that big of a thing. Really. But
thanks.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No, it's okay. I'm just glad you were interested in
seeing what I do.
<PAGE>
Trying to work with an audience in front of me
was pretty exciting, to be honest.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyways, I'd better clean up. See you later,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Um... Actually, I am a pro. Though I guess I
don't look it...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, well. I'm just glad you enjoyed it.
<PAGE>
Anyways, I'd better clean up. See you later,
<MYNAME>.
